subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Olympic Games
Speedskating
lead_paragraph: Stefan Groothuis of the Netherlands won the 1,000 meters, keeping Shani Davis of the United States from becoming the first male speedskater to win three consecutive Olympic golds in one event.
snippet: Stefan Groothuis of the Netherlands won the 1,000 meters, keeping Shani Davis of the United States from becoming the first male speedskater to win three consecutive Olympic golds in one event.
